subject: AI & Agents
title: Labeling Data: The Hidden Bottleneck
description: A short lesson to help you apply Labeling Data: The Hidden Bottleneck.

hook.text: You need 10,000 labeled examples. Your team labels 50 per day. That's 200 working days.

buildup.text: Labeled data is the fuel for supervised ML. Without it, models can't learn task-specific patterns.

discovery.text: Options: in-house annotators, crowdsourcing (MTurk), LLM-assisted labeling, and active learning.

twist.text: Label quality matters more than quantity. 1,000 perfect labels beat 10,000 noisy ones.

climax.text: Use LLMs for initial labels, human reviewers for corrections, and active learning to prioritize.

punchline.text: Labels are the real cost. Budget for them.

quiz.question: Why is labeling data a bottleneck?
